alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 8:58AM PST until December 21 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of six to twelve inches above 9,000 feet. Additional snowfall three to six inches from 8,000 feet to 9,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Sierra Nevada from Yosemite to Tulare County for elevations above 8,000 feet. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
